last_episode_to_air.name: Of Course He's Dead (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Charlie Harper is alive. Or is he?

name: Two and a Half Men
overview: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: A collection of behind-the-scenes features, cast interviews, and retrospective moments celebrating the show’s twelve-year run. Relive the funniest scenes, fan-favorite episodes, and the lasting legacy of television’s most unlikely family.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Bachelor Charlie Harper’s carefree life is turned upside down when his uptight brother Alan and nephew Jake move in, sparking chaos and comedy in Malibu.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Charlie adjusts (badly) to life with family underfoot, while Alan struggles with single fatherhood and dating again, and Jake grows into a lovable troublemaker.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Family ties tighten and tension rises as Charlie’s wild ways clash with Alan’s neuroses, leading to hilarious misadventures in love, work, and parenting.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Change is in the air as Charlie’s bachelor lifestyle meets new romantic twists, while Alan deals with ex‑wife drama and Jake continues to steal every scene.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Charlie finds himself in unfamiliar territory with real feelings, Alan keeps stumbling through relationships, and Jake edges from boyhood into teenage antics.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The house feels smaller than ever as everyone’s bad habits collide — love, money, and family chaos run rampant in Malibu.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: Charlie’s romantic past catches up to him, Alan’s financial woes deepen, and Jake’s teenage years bring a new level of mischief and mayhem.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: Old patterns and new faces collide as the Harpers continue their hilarious struggle to keep life, love, and laundry under control.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: A new chapter begins when internet billionaire Walden Schmidt moves in, bringing fresh energy, wealth, and more absurd adventures to the Malibu household.

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview: Walden and Alan navigate friendship, fatherhood, and fleeting fame while trying (and failing) to get their personal lives together.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: When a young woman claiming to be Charlie’s daughter arrives, life at the beach house turns upside down again in the best, most dysfunctional way.

seasons.name: Season 12
seasons.overview: In the final season, Walden and Alan take drastic (and hilarious) steps to redefine family, love, and what it means to finally grow up.

tagline: Two adults. One kid. No grown-ups.
